answers.answer: This is my first pregnancy but why would they send you home at 6 cm
I don't understand why they sent u home at 6 cm and blood showing I think is not right u should talk to ur Dr. Wish you luck

Well if you're not having consistent contractions that are getting stronger, and your water hasn't broken, then there really isn't any reason to stay at the hospital and be uncomfortable there in one of those beds
Found out the another reason why, I have gestational diabetes baby needs to stay in longer for his lungs. He is only about 6.6 pounds too. And yes the beds are not comfortable. :)
Congratulations you are getting close to meeting your baby

question: Iam due Jan 10th, I have lost mucus plug had bloody show, off and on mild contractions dilated to 6 ....and sent home to wait ..
title: waiting
